message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this product with you. It's a fantastic opportunity to acquire a unique item that will bring significant value to your business. I'm willing to make a competitive offer to get us started.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're placing on the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $7500.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was hoping we could meet in the middle. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $8500. This is a fair price that reflects the value the product brings to your business, and I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.
